description: Edrei and Escoria are walking due a ship board
Edrei looks tired. Escoria is holding a leather stripe and seems to be looking forward
text: CON SUERTE EL CAMINO NO ES MUY LARGO. SI ENCONTRAMOS A ALGUIEN QUE VAYA DIRECTO, SIN PARAR EN OTROS PUEBLOS A COMERCIAR SI, ESO ESTARÍA BIEN

description: A man leans on a wagon with one horse and greets
Escoria smiles with a cheerful expression
A bald man with a gray beard stands with a humble expression
A bald man with a gray beard smiles with a happy face
text: SI, YA VA SIENDO HORA DE VOLVER. ES UNA CASUALIDAD AGRADABLE QUE NOS VOLVAMOS A ENCONTRAR

description: A bald man with a gray beard has a curious face
Edrei looks upset and sad
Escoria is going up a wagon near a horse. A bald bearded man point inside. Edrei walks turned back near a wagon's wheel
Escoria is sitted sharpening her sword. A bald bearded man hold a leather stripes
A bald man with a beard looks back himself. Edrei is reading a book
Edrei has a tired expression
A bald man with a beard laughs funny
Edrei's face looks upset and sad
Edrei turns his head with a tired face
Escoria turns her head back and look with a sad expression
Escoria turns her head back and look with a sad expression
text: EDREI, NO LO HEMOS HABLADO, ¿PORQUE QUERÍAN MATARTE?

description: A bearded bald man has a shocked and surprised expression
Edrei looks down and tired
Escoria turns back herself with an aggresive and impatient look
text: ¿DINERO, VENGANZA? SE QUE VIENES DE FAMILIA RICA, PERO NUNCA TE LO HE PREGUNTADO. PENSABA QUE ABANDONARÍAS A LA PRIMERA DE CAMBIO

description: Edrei closes a book and look behind his shoulder
text: ¿CREES QUE PUEDE SER POR MI FAMILIA?

description: Escoria turns herself back with a worried face
text: ES UNA POSIBILIDAD ¿DE QUÉ FAMILIA VIENES? NO ES QUE FALTE NOBLEZA EN ESTE IMPERIO

description: Edrei closes a book and looks up his shoulder
text: GREYHERZ MI MADRES ES LA PRIMA HERMANA DE LA EMPERATRIZ LUREENE VON DREICHEN

description: A bald man with a gray beard shivers and has a shocked face
A bald man with a beard look back his shoulder and has a nervous expression
Escoria is sitted. Palms her face and holds a sword between her legs
text: SUSPIRA Y CLARO ESO NO ES MOTIVO PARA MATARTE

description: Escoria shouts with a furious expression
text: SI ME PAGASEN POR CADA INTENTO DE ASESINATO ENTRE NOBLES...

description: A village in the midle of the forest. Smoke are lifting to the sky on the village
Escoria and a bearded man are sitted on a wagon
Escoria shouts in hurry
text: ¡RÁPIDO VIENE DEL PUEBLO! ESPERO QUE SE LE OLVIDASE A ALGUIEN UN FUEGO O QUE ESTÉN CELEBRANDO ALGO

Smoke

text: YO BUSCARÉ A QUIÉN HIZO ESTO
